Class PowerHost

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Host
      org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HostDynamicWorkload

public class PowerHost
extends HostDynamicWorkload

PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov
